content:
ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡· Welcome to **Learning Greek**! ðŸ“š

Î“ÎµÎ¹Î± ÏƒÎ¿Ï…! Whether you're learning modern greek or you just want to chat, we're thrilled to have you here as part of our vibrant community!

In this server you can talk with native greek speakers who are here to assist you and fellow learners with whom you can practice. Feel free to ask any question anytime!

Don't forget to read the rules in <#630486369495679007>. You may also want to check out <#645650358042886175> to make sure this server is right for you.

In order to gain full access, please choose a proficiency rank from the drop down menu below:*

*\*If I'm not responding to your choice, contact a moderator*

options.label: Native
options.description: If greek is your native language

options.label: Beginner
options.description: If you just started learning greek or your level is A1

options.label: Elementary
options.description: If your greek level is A2

options.label: Intermediate
options.description: If your greek level is B1

options.label: Upper Intermediate
options.description: If your greek level is B2

options.label: Advanced
options.description: If your greek level is C1

options.label: Fluent
options.description: If your greek level is C2

options.label: Non Learner
options.description: If you don't know greek and you don't want to learn it
